s1.title: Overview
s1.p: The Jesktop API is licensed as BSD license.

s1.title: Open Source Software (OSS)
s1.p: The Jesktop API is fully compatible with all OSI approved software. See http://www.opensource.org/licenses/index.html.
Whatever the license of you opensource project, the changes are it is perfectly valid for it to use the Jesktop API.

s1.title: Commercial/Proprietory Software
s1.p: Commercial software can be written for Jesktop too. Code using the Jesktop API can be kept proprietory - no problem.
